title: Officemate Portable Clipboard Storage Case, Charcoal (83301),11-3/4"w x 1-1/2"d x 14-1/2"h
features: Built-in filing pockets hold CDs, business cards and papers.
Magnetized compartment holds clips in place.
description: Portable storage case also doubles as a briefcase! Large capacity holds papers, forms and notepads; also includes filing pockets for CDs and business cards plus space for pens, pencils and more. One compartment is magnetized to hold clips. Includes ergonomic hand grips, hang hole and durable hinge and clasp.

Whether traveling, on-site, in the field, or in the office, storage clipboards combine storage, filing, and a firm clipboard writing surface with a strong clip. Each is a mini, on-the-go office. Coaches, teachers, estimators, field service reps, couriers, canvassers, drivers, fund-raisers, doctors/nurses/EMTs, police, fire fighters...in fact any active professional will find them to be valuable in-the-field assistants. Officemate offers the widest varieties of clipboard storage products, with a model that is certain to be perfect for your needs.Combination clipboard and portable office. It can even be used as a briefcase. Features an internal storage area for papers and documents, an outer clip for additional paper storage, and built-in filing pockets for CDs and business cards. Three separate filing compartments for pens and pencils, clips, and other small objects. One compartment is magnetized to hold clips in place. Conveniently sized storage box/clipboard provides ample storage space yet fits easily into most briefcases. Features separate compartments for pens and pencils and a secure hinge and clasp closure system. Low-profile clip. Ergonomic finger grips. A new generation of storage/forms holder featuring durable plastic with ergonomic soft hand holds, push button opening, storage compartments for pens and pencils, and plastic-covered sturdy clip. Holds letter/A4 size papers or documents. Has two paper compartments and three clips/pens compartments. Durable yet light-weight. Made from 30% post-consumer recycled plastic.
